languages.text: These chains are coated in a layer of adamantine, significantly increasing their armour and deflection, but this coating can be destroyed by a single {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g}.

traits.locale_text: These chains are coated in a layer of adamantine, significantly increasing their armour and deflection, but this coating can be destroyed by a single {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g}.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} are significantly increased. But a single {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}hit{/g} can destroy this durable plating.
languages.original_text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}отражение{/g} объекта существенно увеличены. Но одного {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}попадания{/g} {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}бронебойно-фугасного снаряда{/g} достаточно, чтобы уничтожить это прочное защитное покрытие.

traits.locale_text: Armour and deflection of this object are significantly increased. But a single hit of the {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE shell{/g} can destroy this durable plating.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değerleri önemli ölçüde artar. Ama tek bir {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}ZDYP top mermisi{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}vuruşu{/g}, bu dayanıklı kaplamayı imha edebilir.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y el {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} aumentan considerablemente, pero un solo {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}impacto{/g} de {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}obús perforante explosivo{/g} es capaz de destruir este sólido blindaje.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}がかなり上昇する。しかし、一つでも{g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHEシェル{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}ヒット{/g}すると、この頑丈なプレーティングを破壊できる。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstung{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} werden deutlich erhöht. Ein einziger {g|Encyclopedia:HitSequenceGlossary}Treffer{/g} einer {g|f:fc8b3cc2fb9344b88ad38a246b05ba26}APHE-Granate{/g} kann diese robuste Panzerung allerdings zerstören.
